title: Thomas Tuchel - Wikipedia
snippet: On 24 March 2023, Tuchel was announced as head coach at Bayern Munich on a two-year deal, replacing his former player Julian Nagelsmann, who was dismissed. Tuchel was presented at a club press conference the following day, where he said "the squad assembled [here] is one of the most talented ...

title: Bayern Munich and Thomas Tuchel to part ways in the summer | Bundesliga
snippet: Until then, I and my coaching team will of course continue to do everything we can to ensure maximum success." Thomas Tuchel succeeded Julian Nagelsmann as coach of Bayern in March 2023.

title: Thomas Tuchel's Bayern Munich: The numbers behind his impending departure | Bundesliga
snippet: 12 - Tuchel had initially signed a deal through to 30 June 2025, but will now depart Bayern 12 months earlier. 464 - It means he will have been in charge 464 days since taking over on 24 March 2023.

title: Thomas Tuchel replaces Julian Nagelsmann as Bayern Munich head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Thomas Tuchel (l.) is the new Bayern Munich head coach, replacing Julian Nagelsmann.
